pages.title: Book Smart
pages.text: You gain a flat increase of 500 mana to your Ars Nouveau mana pool$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Bubble Mask
pages.text: You are able to breathe underwater$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Cheat Death
pages.text: When dying, recieve the effects of a totem of undying (regeneration, fire resistance, absorption, and resistance) on a 5 minute cooldown$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Enchanted Weapon
pages.text: Your weapons deal +1 fire damage$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: False Life
pages.text: You gain +4 health (2 hearts)$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Holy Elixer
pages.text: Healing potions have their level passively increased by 1$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Intelligence
pages.text: You gain 150% more experience from experience orbs$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Knowledge of the Ages
pages.text: Gain the Apotheosis Knowledge of the Ages (enemy drops turn into experience) effect($(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Life Essence
pages.text: You heal one health for every kill$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Mage Armor
pages.text: When taking damage gain absorption on a two and half minute cool down$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Magic Resist
pages.text: When attacked, you take 2 less damage against magical mobs$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Magic Training
pages.text: You gain 943 PMMO Magic xp$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Mana Regen
pages.text: Increases your Ars Nouveau base mana regen by 5$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Mana Regen II
pages.text: Increases your Ars Nouveau base mana regen by 10$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Poison Dipped
pages.text: When hitting an enemy, you have a 25% chance to apply a 30 second poison$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Potion Bonus
pages.text: You can increase the level of a potion by dipping it into a cauldron$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Smite
pages.text: Your damage is increased by 60% against the undead$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Spell Damage
pages.text: You gain the Ars Nouveau spell damage potion effect$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()

pages.title: Tomb Bound
pages.text: The keep inventory gamerule is applied to you$(br2)$(br2)$(l:the_class_tree/mage_powers#mage_powerlist)RETURN TO TOP$()
